#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
int main() {
    int t,i,count;cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {ll n,m,a[101];
    count=0;
    cin>>n>>m;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {cin>>a[i];
    a[i]=a[i]+m;
    if(a[i]%7==0)
    count++;
        
    }
    cout<<count<<"\n";
        
    }
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
